ValidationRule.description: No one should edit subType field except system admins
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED (Sub_Type__c), OR(ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Sub_Type__c),"Contract Cancellation"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Sub_Type__c),"Contract Replacement") ), NOT($Profile.Name = "System Administrator"), NOT($Profile.Name = "Order Operations Admin"), NOT($Permission.Validation_Rule_Exemption) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Subtype for a Cancel & Replace (C&R) Opportunity cannot be changed. If you require this change, please contact a Salesforce Admin.
